name: The Art Commision
title: Director of IT
accomplishments: I brought hundreds of outstanding requests down to a manageable level.
I helped launch the first CODAVideo Awards.
learnings: I learned the hardships of a small startup dependent upon continued funding.
reasonLeft: The company was late in getting their next round of funding and had to cut everyone's pay in half. I had just gotten married and bought a house so I had to move on.
